## Shiwon Kim (Sean)

[![Website](https://img.shields.io/badge/Website-up-lightbrown)](#)
[![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/LinkedIn-0a66c2?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/shiwon-kim/)

I am an AI researcher working on scalable and data-efficient machine learning systems for medical imaging. My research focuses on enabling models to learn from dynamic and limited data that are common in the real world but remain challenging for deep neural networks.
